description: The performance and skiability of a rookie with fierce ambitions. This is the only twin tip model in our touring range, a ski designed to offer joyful adherence, which allows better skiing with less effort. It is light, but does not trade weight for sensations, the Draco is for skiers who want to be wild and creative. Made to search and find happiness.
name: Draco Freebird Skis 2023/24

specs.value: Semi-cap, Cap in Tip & Tail for Lightness & Handling, Abs Sidewalls Underfoot
Double Rocker, Great Maneuverability, Control & Pivot
Classic Camber Underfoot With Short Ski
Slightly Straight Sidecut for More Stability And Better Balance Between firmness and Maneuverability
Firm Flex for Stability and Precision, With Progressive Flex in Tip for Comfort and efficiency
